rukus.text: 2|2|uihog-ui yeojiga eobsneun i seongseoneun hananim-eul gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-eul wihan giljab-ila
2|3|geudeul-eun boiji anhneun geos-eul mid-eumyeo kkujunhi yebaeleul deulimyeo nae(hananim)ga geudeul-ege bepun yangsig-eulosseo huisahaneun jadeul-ila
2|4|geudeul-eun geudae(muhammadeu)ege naelyeojin geosgwa geudae ijeon-e naelyeojin geos-eul mid-eumyeo, naesee gwanhayeo geudeul-eun gudgeonhi middeola
2|5|geuleohan jadeul-eun geudeul junim-eulobuteoui indoui gil-eul ttaleugo iss-eumyeo geuleohan jadeul-eun sillo seong-gonghan jadeul-ila
2|6|sillo bulsinhan jadeul-eun geudaega geudeul-ege gyeong-gohadeun gyeong-gohaji anhdeun byeonham-eobs-eul geos-ini geudeul-eun midji anh-eul geos-ila
2|7|hananimkkeseo geudeul-ui ma-eumgwa geudeul-ui cheong-gag-eul bong-inhasyeoss-eumyeo geudeul-ui sigag-eun galigaelo deophyeo issnola. geuligo geudeul-egeneun chamhoghan beol-i iss-eul geos-ila
